summary: Provides a set of MAPDL database commands for managing named collections of entities, known as components. The module offers utilities to create, delete, edit, group, enumerate, modify, visualize, select, and persist these component subsets, facilitating easy reuse and manipulation within the simulation environment.
business_intent: Enable users to efficiently organize and reuse groups of model entities, streamlining selection processes and analysis workflows in ANSYS MAPDL simulations.
